title: [工具] MoreProtect —— 防止玩家被骚扰！ [全版本][深度汉化]
author: chengzi
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-17 09:51 编辑 


MoreProtect - 更多防护
深度汉化! v1 Update 4 [CB 1.6.2 Jul 22]
前言

大家好, 我是橙子, 从前我总是尝试去找到所有骚扰别人的家伙! 当有一个人上线的时候, 我总是要隐身然后传送到他们身边来确认他们不是开始骚扰/破坏! 就算他们只破坏了一个书柜, 我得几个星期后才能发现.
这个插件就是为了节省你的时间. 只要坐下来休息, 然后等待警报出现. 只要没有警报, 所有事情就都很好. 就算有的事情没被警报给你, MoreProtect 使用 CoreProtect(汉化) 所以所有改变都会被记录并且可以完全回档!


(自动抓住骚扰者！)

(突出被修改的方块！)

命令和权限

你可以使用 /moreprotect, /mo, /antigrief 和 /ag 、只要你喜欢 (但是 /ag 更容易输入! ;p)
命令描述/agView grief reports/ag helpView help/ag p<num>View a page/ag <num>View a report detailed/ag tp <num>Teleports you to a grief report/ag confirm <num>Confirm a grief report (you think it's grief)/ag ignore <num>Ignore a grief report (you don't know)/ag drop <num>Drop a grief report (you think it's NOT grief)/ag hl <num>Highlights a grief report's positions/ag remove <num>Completely remove a grief report/ag remove p<num>Remove all grief reports on a page/ag remove allCompletely remove all grief reports/trust <player>Trust a player/untrust <player>Untrust a player/trust <player1> <player2>Force player1 to trust player2/untrust <player1> <player2>Force player1 to untrust player2/ag exempt <name>Exempt a player from being checked/ag alertToggle whether you want to see alerts权限描述默认值moreprotect.viewView grief reportsopmoreprotect.teleportTeleport to a grief report locationopmoreprotect.confirmConfirm a grief reportopmoreprotect.ignoreIgnore a grief reportopmoreprotect.dropDrop a grief reportopmoreprotect.highlightHighlight the blocks of a grief reportopmoreprotect.trustTrust and untrust a playertruemoreprotect.exemptUse the /exempt commandopmoreprotect.is.exemptWith this permission someone IS exempt immediatelyopmoreprotect.removeRemove a grief reportopmoreprotect.trust.otherCreate and remove a trust between other playersopmoreprotect.alertGet alerts when reports are createdop
配置文件

配置文件里已经写明了每个选项的意思. 你想要哪些就启用哪些! :) (位于/plugins/MoreProtect/configuration.txt)
注:部分内容未汉化,我相信你们看得懂!

修改记录


MoreProtect 1 update 4
Updated to CoreProtect 2.0.8
MoreProtect 1 update 3
Now remembers which page you were looking atAdded /remove p<num>Added /remove allUpdated to CraftBukkit 1.6.2
MoreProtect 1 update 2
Added more info to report overview for consoleAdded optional warnings for playersAdded instant-highlight when teleportingAdded showing grief report number when creating reportAdded option to show changed blocks when teleporting to reportAdded option to show relevant details when teleporting to reportUpdated to CoreProtect 2.07bUpdated to CraftBukkit 1.5.2Breaking melon blocks and pumpkins is by default no longer seen as interestingAdded ignoring reports with #tnt, #piston, #fire, #obstruction, #physics or #creeper as victimFixed a bug where accusations were not savedAdded '/ag fix' to automatically fix rollbacks and restores that went wrong beforeMore info in alerts and notificationsAdded more command aliasesCleaned up code
MoreProtect 1 update 1
Added configurationAdded moreprotect.is.exempt permissionAdded accusation to reportsAdded bucket filling eventAdded support for sand and gravel placingAdded suspect name and blocks changed to report overview
MoreProtect 1
Initial release

这个插件可以自定义哪些物品不提示么，动别人的火把、小麦、西瓜南瓜等等都要提示，太过于繁杂了。
还有就是能设定一定数量内不提醒么，比如只提醒破坏超过20格的玩家。

.class文件里面要是能改也可以
